net.sepp_tember.lib.randomizer

Class WeightedUnlimitedRandomizeType

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sepp_tember.lib.randomizer.WeightedUnlimitedRandomizeType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RandomizeType
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class WeightedUnlimitedRandomizeType
extends Object
implements RandomizeType
    Randomization type to create a randomizer that produces an endless sequence of indexes with a weighted distribution.
    See Also:
    Randomize.weightedUnlimitedRandomization(double[])

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WeightedUnlimitedRandomizeType(double[] weights)
      Deprecated. 
      Creates a randomization type to create a randomizer that produces an endless sequence of indexes with a weighted distribution defined by the specified weights.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Randomizer createRandomizer(Collection<?> source)
      Deprecated. 
      Creates a new randomizer for the specified collection.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WeightedUnlimitedRandomizeType

        public WeightedUnlimitedRandomizeType(double[] weights)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a randomization type to create a randomizer that produces an endless sequence of indexes with a weighted distribution defined by the specified weights. The number of weights has to match the number of elements later given to createRandomizer(Collection).
        Parameters:
        weights - weights to calculate distribution
        See Also:
        Randomize.weightedUnlimitedRandomization(double[])

    • Method Detail

      • createRandomizer

        public Randomizer createRandomizer(Collection<?> source)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a new randomizer for the specified collection. The size of the collection has to match the number of weights given to WeightedUnlimitedRandomizeType(double[]).
        Specified by:
        createRandomizer in interface RandomizeType
        Parameters:
        source - the collection the randomizer should be created for.
        Returns:
        randomizer for weighted distribution
        See Also:
        Randomize.weightedUnlimitedRandomization(double[])
